text: A truly great composition from Sugiyama. My favorite game in one of my favorite series, Dragon Quest is the true definition of comfort food games for me. I'm patiently waiting for the Switch version of DQ11 which seems filled with nice updates. I've heard great things!
author: SupraDarky

text: I was so hoping NA would get the 3ds version of dq11.
author: Everlasting

text: I agree! Usually, people do not mention this one when talking about DQ games, which is really a shame, since it is very unique.
author: LightFykki

text: I know I'm probably gonna get bashed on this but........I perfer DQ5 over DQ8
author: Sir Seliph

text: Hi Supradarky! I was wondering if you would be interested in checking out Mages of Mystralia's soundtrack, in particular the Sky Temple. I feel like you would love that soundtrack, especially the Sky Temple theme. It's one of my favorites from the game and maybe might be one of my favorite music tracks in a game period. Let me know what you think!
author: Marcos Garcia

text: And I'm back to catch up with all the videos I missed

text: Dont know what it is, these characters artstyle just is so offputting that i can't think about anything else than Dragon Ball.
author: Ether Pump

text: Akira Toriyama created the art for both Dragonball and Dragonquest.
author: Soobleej

text: @Soobleej Well, yes. You can figure that out by looking at it.
author: Ether Pump

text: The thing is that they wanted a cartoonish artstyle that was iconic and for Japan what better option then Akira Toriyama? Its not very uncommon to bring in manga artist to design characters in a video game.

text: Yeah this game was great. I ate up the SFC version and happily played through the PS2 version. An all time favorite Dragon Quest of mine too.

text: I love both V and VIII equally and although VIII has the best OST (in my opinion) V has the best party chat by far!

text: my fav qd game and in my top 10 for sure <3
author: OfficialAbass

text: My favorite of the series and one of my favorite games of all time. As a person that is soley about finding a wife and having children in life, this game is for me. Adventures as a kid with a strong father, then as most games would go, you grow up to become the hero. This game however has you find a wife, have kids, then your kids are the ones who are the real heroes. Family and adventure. I love it!
author: Everlasting

text: Zenithia in IV sounds the best
author: FinallyJeremy
